section.section: Each board consists of 7 members appointed by the Governor.
The Governor shall appoint the members from a list of qualified individuals submitted to the Governor by the Secretary.
The term of a member is 4 years.

The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of each board on July 1, 1982. The terms of those members end as follows:
1 in 1983.
4 in 1984.
1 in 1985.
1 in 1986.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who serves 2 consecutive full 4-year terms may not be reappointed for 4 years after completion of those terms.
